skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Heals this Champion by 15% of the damage inflicted.

skills.desc: Heals this Champion by 30% of their MAX HP and places a 30% [Increase DEF] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.

skills.desc: Exchanges remaining HP levels with a target enemy, then equalizes the HP of all allies.
skills.name: Soul Possession
